tool-switcher.midnightconfig.title: Tool Switcher
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.enabled.too: Enable or disable the mod. Can be toggled with a key binding
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.sneaking.to: Whether Tool Switcher remains active while sneaking
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.showMessage: Whether to show a message on the screen when the key binding is pressed
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.goBack.tool: Whether to switch back to the slot you were using before mining
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.respectSilk: Whether to avoid switching tools if you are holding a Silk Touch or Fortune tool
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.disabledToo: Tools that will not be switched to
tool-switcher.midnightconfig.disabledBlo: Blocks that will not trigger Tool Switcher
